name: Color Tiles
description:
A combination of colorful minigames. Challenge yourself to get the highest score you can!

Color Holes and Turbo Mode: Use the arrow keys to guide your way into the hole.

Color Swap: Click on the right button to become the same color as the incoming tile.

Color Chains and Color Codes: Use the buttons to mimic the given code.

Credits:
